Shared taxi or combi from Tarapoto.  In Tarapoto you need to take mototaxi to the "paradero" (station) to Sauce

Laguna Azul - many hotels give boat rides on the lake
Waterfalls - there are several waterfalls to see

Suace Resort - the fancy resort
Puerto Azul - a very cute family-run hotel in the "2 de Mayo" village near Sauce.
